names: Integer Set_attribute(Attributes attr, Text att_name, Text att)

description.old: For the Attributes attr,if the attribute called att_name does not exist then create it as type Text and give it the valueatt. if the first attribute called att_name does exist and it is type Text, then set its value to att. If the attribute exists and is not of type Text, then a non-zero return value is returned. A function return value of zero indicates the attribute value is successfully set. Note - the Get_attribute_type call can be used to get the type of the attribute called att_name.
description.new: For the Attributes attr, if the attribute called att_name does not exist then create it as type Text and give it the value att. If the first attribute called att_name does exist and it is type Text, then set its value to att. If the attribute exists and is not of type Text, then a non-zero return value is returned. A function return value of zero indicates the attribute value is successfully set. Note - the Get_attribute_type call can be used to get the type of the attribute called att_name.
